mapper.select: select allocateB.id as id, part.en_name as productName, part.id as productId, part.parts_number as productN, allocateB.pending_storage_qty as productNum, 2 as sourceType from ope_allocate_b allocateB inner join ope_parts part on part.id=allocateB.part_id and part.dr=0 where allocateB.dr=0 and allocateB.allocate_id=#{id} limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select assemblyB.id as id, product.en_name as productName, product.id as productId, assemblyB.in_wait_wh_qty as productNum, 3 as sourceType from ope_assembly_b_order assemblyB inner join ope_parts_product product on product.id=assemblyB.product_id and product.dr=0 where assemblyB.dr=0 and assemblyB.assembly_id=#{id} limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
